contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox German Regierungsbezirk |name = Dresden |map = Saxony Direktionsbezirk Dresden.png |mapcaption = Map of Saxony highlighting the former Direktionsbezirk of Dresden |state = Saxony |capital = [[Dresden]] |area = 7931 |population = 1626870 |population_as_of = 31 Dec. 2010 |dissolved = 1 March 2012 |url = [http://www.rp-dresden.de/ www.rp-dresden.de] }} [[File:Sachsen rbdresden.png|thumb|right|200px|The [[:de:Regierungsbezirk Dresden|Regierungsbezirk Dresden]] before August 2008]] '''Dresden''' is one of the three former [[Regierungsbezirk|Direktionsbezirk]]e of the [[Free State of Saxony]], [[Germany]], located in the east of the state. It coincided with the ''Planungsregionen'' Oberlausitz-Niederschlesien and Oberes Elbtal/Osterzgebirge. It was disbanded in March 2012. ==History== The Direktionsbezirk Dresden came into existence on 1 August 2008, and succeeded the [[Regierungsbezirk]] Dresden. ==Administrative divisions== {| ! width="50%" | ''Kreise''<br />(districts) ! width="50%" | ''Kreisfreie Städte''<br />(district-free towns) |- | valign="top" | # [[Bautzen (district)|Bautzen]] # [[Görlitz (district)|Görlitz]] # [[Meißen (district)|Meißen]] # [[Sächsische Schweiz-Osterzgebirge]] | valign="top" | # [[Dresden]] |} ==See also== *[[Dresden (Bezirk)|Bezirk Dresden]] ==References== <references /> ==External links== *[http://www.rp-dresden.de/ Official website] {{Direktionsbezirk (Saxony)}} {{coord|51.17|14.0|display=title|format=dms}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Dresden (Region)}} [[Category:Geography of Saxony]] [[Category:NUTS 2 statistical regions of the European Union]]
